CustomField.description: Counts up the number of premium order management opportunities and Premium: Marketplace Opportunities that have the relevant statuses - for use with OPSSYS-1030 validation rule name: signed onboarding opportunity check - OPSSYS-1030
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Counts up the number of Premium: order management opportunities with status proposal sent or later OR Counts up the number of Premium: Marketplace opportunities with status first offer sent or later
CustomField.label: # of Premium Opportunities 2

summaryFilterItems.value: First Offer Sent, Contract Sent, Contract Pending, Closed:Succeeded, Proposal Sent, Contract Pending, Signed/Onboarding, Execution, Closed:Succeeded
